title: Bold script letter used on a Berlin flyer
author: maartendeckers

comments.content:
Ryuk, I ran the (very good quality) sample through WhatTheFont and got no match--and it's a typeface they sell.

Very disappointing. But nice to see that it is from The Northern Block Ltd--they do great work.

> Ryuk, I ran the (very good quality) sample through WhatTheFont and got no match--and it's a typeface they sell. Very disappointing.

This one rung me a bell instantly: commercial font, recent, blue background MyFonts font specimen... But no name or foundry. I decided to run WhatFontiS (not using anymore WhatTheFont app as most of the time, it can't even identify fonts sold on MyFonts... Shame...) to get a little help but no valuable clue. Then I remember this type was designed by The Northern Block, a complete different design of what Jonathan Hill usually delivers. I browsed his fonts and found Velik.
